overview:
Kate Carruthers is an entrepreneur and business consultant who has delivered strategic IT, marketing, web and e-commerce solutions for diverse organisations across the private sector and government.

She is deeply involved with social media and the digital revolution. Over the past few years Kate has worked with business, web, and marketing teams to deliver integrated digital and marketing strategies.

Kate has completed postgraduate studies in management, marketing and e-commerce. Previously she lectured at Macquarie University in the Graduate Accounting Program.

She has worked in senior executive roles with a broad range of organisations including â€“ Westfield Ltd, NSW State Treasury, General Electric, AMP Limited, Citibank, and the National Trust of Australia.

In recent years Kate has also become involved in start-ups and the local entrepreneur community. She co-founded Social Innovation Sydney with the goal of bringing change-makers together for collaboration and creation of new businesses.
